item.title: The International Teen Researchers Conference 2024
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Steered by Learn With Leaders, ITRC is a platform for High School Researchers and Ideators. As the global leader in Research studies for High School students, Learn With Leaders has transformed thousands of teenagers into adept published researchers in the Ivy League mold, with Harvard University undergraduates mentoring them.

The post The International Teen Researchers Conference 2024 appeared first on Learn with leaders.
item.content:encoded:
